title: Sunset Token
author: Sunset Token
content: For everyone that dont know Sunset Token is doing a public sale and we are aiming to be listed on #pancakeswap in 12 days , you are not supposed to buy but will help us alot, this is the time for you to buy tokens and to use them for traveling with us , staking and for trading. We are doing a giveaway for everyone that purchases more then $500Dont miss the chanceFor more info visit our website : https://sunset-token.com/Our mission is to develop the first functional DAO in the travel market, in which, travelers and travel-related product and service providers trade between each other in a platform powered by blockchain technology. By developing a dApp in the travel market we can achieve the creation of a transparent business model, thus, enhance trust amongst all the relevant stakeholders. In the process of development is our commitment to raise awareness about sustainability issues and promote sustainable tourism practices amongst consumers and suppliers alike.
